TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void OnChangeEventHandler(object sender, SqlNotificationEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed OnChangeEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: A object that contains the event data.
Docs.summary: Handles the event that is fired when a notification is received for any of the commands associated with a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange> event does not necessarily imply a change in the data. Other circumstances, such as time-out expired and failure to set the notification request, also generate <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange>.
